questions.question: When a point is in the 1st quadrant, where is it located with respect to the Vertical Plane (VP) and Horizontal Plane (HP)?

answers.A: In front of VP and above HP
answers.D: In front of VP and below HP

explanations.A: In front of VP and above HP

questions.question: In which quadrant does a point lie if it is above the Horizontal Plane (HP) and on the Vertical Plane (VP)?
What is the significance of the notation a’’ in the given context?
When a point is below the Horizontal Plane (HP) and in front of the Vertical Plane (VP), where is its top view located?
How is the upper part of the Vertical Plane (VP) represented after clockwise rotation in the 2nd quadrant?
What is the representation of a point in the first quadrant with respect to VP and HP?

answers.A: In front of VP and below HP
answers.C: In front of VP and above HP

explanations.C: In front of VP and above HP

questions.question: What is the common characteristic of points in the 3rd quadrant?
How is the lower part of the Vertical Plane (VP) represented after clockwise rotation in the 4th quadrant?
What is the position of a point in Experiment 4 in relation to VP and HP?

answers.A: In front of VP and above HP
answers.D: In front of VP and below HP

explanations.D: In front of VP and below HP

questions.question: When a point is on the Horizontal Plane (HP) and behind the Vertical Plane (VP), where is its top view located?
When a point is on the Horizontal Plane (HP) and in front of the Vertical Plane (VP), where is its top view located?
What is the position of a point when it is below the Horizontal Plane (HP) and behind the Vertical Plane (VP)?
What is the representation of a point above the Horizontal Plane (HP) and behind the Vertical Plane (VP) in the 2nd quadrant?

answers.C: Above XY in front view, below XY in top view
answers.D: Below XY in front view, above XY in top view
